auth.resetPasswordInstructions: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
auth.passwordResetSent: Password reset instructions sent to your email
auth.invalidPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.invalidUsername: Username must be at least 3 characters
auth.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
auth.resetFailed: Password reset failed. Please try again.

tests.title: Title
tests.confirmSubmit: Are you sure you want to submit your test?

listening.title: Listening
listening.description: This test measures how well you understand spoken English.
listening.instructions: You will hear audio recordings and answer questions based on what you hear. You will have time to read the questions before the audio plays.
listening.formatBullet1: The test consists of several parts.
listening.formatBullet2: You will listen to recordings and answer questions.
listening.formatBullet3: Questions include multiple choice and fill-in-the-blanks.
listening.tipBullet1: Focus on key words while listening.
listening.tipBullet2: Try to understand the general meaning without distractions.
listening.tipBullet3: Read the questions beforehand to know what to listen for.
listening.section1Description: In this part, you will hear a conversation between two people in an everyday social context. Listen carefully and answer the questions.
listening.listenBeforeAnswer: Please listen to the audio carefully before answering the questions.

reading.title: Reading
reading.description: This test measures how well you understand written English.
reading.instructions: You will read passages and answer questions based on what you read. You have 60 minutes to complete this test.
reading.formatBullet1: The reading test contains several passages.
reading.formatBullet2: You will answer questions based on these texts.
reading.formatBullet3: Questions test your understanding of details, main ideas, and vocabulary.
reading.tipBullet1: Skim the passage first to get a general idea.
reading.tipBullet3: Read the questions carefully and refer back to the text.
reading.tabSwitchWarning: Switching tabs during the test may lead to disqualification.
reading.confirmSubmitMessage: Are you sure you want to submit your answers?
reading.answeredQuestions: You have answered {{count}} out of {{total}} questions.

writing.title: Writing
writing.description: This test measures your ability to write in English.
writing.instructions: You will complete two writing tasks. Task 1 requires you to describe visual information. Task 2 requires you to write an essay on a given topic.
writing.task1Instructions: You will complete two writing tasks. Task 1 requires you to describe visual information.
writing.task1Bullet1: Summarize the main features of the image or graph.
writing.task1Bullet2: Compare and contrast the key data points.
writing.task1Bullet3: Make sure your description is clear and concise.
writing.task2Instructions: Task 2 requires you to write an essay on a given topic.
writing.task2Bullet2: Support your ideas with relevant examples.
writing.task2Bullet3: Ensure your essay has a clear introduction, body, and conclusion.

speaking.title: Speaking
speaking.description: This test measures your ability to speak English.
speaking.instructions: You will complete several speaking tasks. You will be recorded and evaluated by our AI assistant.
speaking.formatBullet1: The speaking test is divided into multiple parts.
speaking.formatBullet2: You will be asked personal questions and given topics to talk about.
speaking.formatBullet3: Your responses will be recorded and evaluated later.
speaking.tipBullet2: Use a range of vocabulary and grammar structures.
speaking.tipBullet3: Try to expand your answers with explanations and examples.
speaking.microphoneRequired: A working microphone is required to take the speaking test.
speaking.microphonePermission: Please allow microphone access to begin the test.

results.title: Test Results
results.noCertificate: Complete all four test sections to receive your certificate

profile.title: Profile
profile.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
errors.server: Server error. Please try again later.
